Class MakefileHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jayway.maven.plugins.android.phase05compile.MakefileHelper

  • public class MakefileHelper
extends Object
    Various helper methods for dealing with Android Native makefiles.
    Author:
    Johan Lindquist

      • cleanupAfterBuild

        public static void cleanupAfterBuild(MakefileHelper.MakefileHolder makefileHolder)
        Cleans up all include directories created in the temp directory during the build.
        Parameters:
        makefileHolder - The holder produced by the MakefileHelper#createMakefileFromArtifacts(java.io.File, java.util.Set, boolean, org.sonatype.aether.RepositorySystemSession, java.util.List, org.sonatype.aether.RepositorySystem)

      • createMakefileFromArtifacts

        public MakefileHelper.MakefileHolder createMakefileFromArtifacts(File outputDir,
                                                        Set<org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact> artifacts,
                                                        String ndkArchitecture,
                                                        String defaultNDKArchitecture,
                                                        boolean useHeaderArchives)
                                                          throws IOException,
                                                                 org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException
        Creates an Android Makefile based on the specified set of static library dependency artifacts.
        Parameters:
        outputDir - Directory to resolve artifact locations relative to. Makefiles contain relative paths
        artifacts - The list of (static library) dependency artifacts to create the Makefile from
        useHeaderArchives - If true, the Makefile should include a LOCAL_EXPORT_C_INCLUDES statement, pointing to the location where the header archive was expanded
        repoSession -
        projectRepos -
        repoSystem -
        Returns:
        The created Makefile
        Throws:
        IOException
        org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException

        Returns:
        Throws:

        Method to split the path components of a file into a List

        Returns:

      • createLibraryList

        public String createLibraryList(Set<org.apache.maven.artifact.Artifact> resolvedLibraryList,
                       String ndkArchitecture,
                       boolean staticLibrary)
        Creates a list of artifacts suitable for use in the LOCAL_STATIC_LIBRARIES or LOCAL_SHARED_LIBRARIES variable in an Android makefile
        Parameters:
        resolvedLibraryList -
        staticLibrary -
        Returns:
        a list of Ids for artifacts that include static or shared libraries
